GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object of the given review

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: when passed an object with inc_votes key, will increment the votes on the given review by given amount and serves an object with the updated review

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: when passed an object with a body and username key, will post the new comment to the database and return the created object

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments with the given review ID sorted in reverse chronological order
